languages.text: "Прошу простить меня за прямоту, но я бы хотел обратиться к вам с просьбой. Быть может, перед встречей достославн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан сможет уделить несколько минут беседе со мной?" {n}Ахиллеас склоняет голову.{/n} "Уверен, вы найдете мой отчет о положении дел в протекторате фон Валанциус более чем полезным".

traits.locale_text: "Прошу простить меня за прямоту, но я бы хотел обратиться к вам с просьбой. Быть может, перед встречей достославн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан сможет уделить несколько минут беседе со мной?" {n}Ахиллеас склоняет голову.{/n} "Уверен, вы найдете мой отчет о положении дел в торговой империи фон Валанциус более чем полезным".

languages.text: "I apologise for my bluntness, but I have a request to make. Perhaps, before the meeting takes place, the illustrious Lord Captain could spare a few minutes for a conversation with me?" {n}Achilleas bows his head.{/n} "I'm certain that you will find my report on the state of affairs in the von Valancius protectorate most useful."
languages.original_text: "Прошу простить меня за прямоту, но я бы хотел обратиться к вам с просьбой. Быть может, перед встречей достославн{mf|ый|ая} Лорд-капитан сможет уделить несколько минут беседе со мной?" {n}Ахиллеас склоняет голову.{/n} "Уверен, вы найдете мой отчет о положении дел в протекторате фон Валанциус более чем полезным".

traits.locale_text: "I apologize for my bluntness, but I have a request to make. Perhaps, before the meeting takes place, the illustrious Lord Captain could spare a few minutes for a conversation with me?" {n}Achilleas bows his head.{/n} "I'm certain that you will find my report on the state of affairs in the von Valancius trade empire most useful."

"I apologise for my bluntness, but I have a request to make. Perhaps, before the meeting takes place, the illustrious Lord Captain could spare a few minutes for a conversation with me?" {n}Achilleas bows his head.{/n} "I'm certain that you will find my report on the state of affairs in the von Valancius protectorate most useful."

languages.text: “我很抱歉这么直截了当，但我有个请求。或许在会议正式开始之前，伟大的舰长大人愿意抽出时间，和我谈谈？”{n}阿吉里亚斯低下了头。{/n}“我这里有关于冯·瓦兰修斯属地的报告。我很确信，您会发现我的报告非常有用。”
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my bluntness, but I have a request to make. Perhaps, before the meeting takes place, the illustrious Lord Captain could spare a few minutes for a conversation with me?" {n}Achilleas bows his head.{/n} "I'm certain that you will find my report on the state of affairs in the von Valancius protectorate most useful."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉这么直截了当，但我有个请求。或许在会议正式开始之前，伟大的舰长大人愿意抽出时间，和我谈谈？”{n}阿吉里亚斯低下了头。{/n}“我这里有关于冯·瓦兰修斯属地的报告。我很确信，您会发现我的报告非常有用。”

languages.text: «Lamento ser tan directo, pero tengo una solicitud. Lord Capitán, ¿podría dedicarme unos minutos antes de que tenga lugar la reunión?». {n}Achilleas inclina la cabeza.{/n} «No me cabe duda de que mi informe sobre el estado de la situación en el protectorado von Valancius le será muy útil».
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my bluntness, but I have a request to make. Perhaps, before the meeting takes place, the illustrious Lord Captain could spare a few minutes for a conversation with me?" {n}Achilleas bows his head.{/n} "I'm certain that you will find my report on the state of affairs in the von Valancius protectorate most useful."

traits.locale_text: «Lamento ser tan directo, pero tengo una solicitud. Lord Capitán, ¿podría dedicarme unos minutos antes de que tenga lugar la reunión?». {n}Achilleas inclina la cabeza.{/n} «No me cabe duda de que mi informe sobre el estado de la situación en el protectorado von Valancius le será muy útil».

languages.text: 「ぶしつけで申し訳ございませんが、お願いがございます。総督とお会いする前に、私とお話しするためにお時間をちょうだいしてもよろしいでしょうか？」{n}アキレアスがお辞儀をする。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家の状況について、お役に立つかもしれない報告がございます」
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my bluntness, but I have a request to make. Perhaps, before the meeting takes place, the illustrious Lord Captain could spare a few minutes for a conversation with me?" {n}Achilleas bows his head.{/n} "I'm certain that you will find my report on the state of affairs in the von Valancius protectorate most useful."

traits.locale_text: 「ぶしつけで申し訳ございませんが、お願いがございます。総督とお会いする前に、私とお話しするためにお時間をちょうだいしてもよろしいでしょうか？」{n}アキレアスがお辞儀をする。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス保護国家の状況について、お役に立つかもしれない報告がございます」

languages.text: "Verzeiht meine Offenheit, aber ich habe eine Bitte. Könnte der erlauchte Lord Captain vor dem Treffen vielleicht einige Minuten für ein Gespräch mit mir erübrigen?" {n}Achilleas senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin sicher, Ihr werdet meinen Bericht zur Lage im Protektorat von Valancius als überaus nützlich erachten."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my bluntness, but I have a request to make. Perhaps, before the meeting takes place, the illustrious Lord Captain could spare a few minutes for a conversation with me?" {n}Achilleas bows his head.{/n} "I'm certain that you will find my report on the state of affairs in the von Valancius protectorate most useful."

traits.locale_text: "Verzeiht meine Offenheit, aber ich habe eine Bitte. Könnte der erlauchte Lord Captain vor dem Treffen vielleicht einige Minuten für ein Gespräch mit mir erübrigen?" {n}Achilleas senkt den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bin sicher, Ihr werdet meinen Bericht zur Lage im Protektorat von Valancius als überaus nützlich erachten."

languages.text: « Pardonnez mon audace, mais j'aurais une requête à vous soumettre, si l'illustre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} voulait bien m'accorder quelques minutes avant l'entrevue avec le gouverneur, {n}suggère Achilleas en inclinant la tête,{/n} je suis certain que mon rapport sur la situation du protectorat von Valancius lui serait utile. »
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my bluntness, but I have a request to make. Perhaps, before the meeting takes place, the illustrious Lord Captain could spare a few minutes for a conversation with me?" {n}Achilleas bows his head.{/n} "I'm certain that you will find my report on the state of affairs in the von Valancius protectorate most useful."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez mon audace, mais j'aurais une requête à vous soumettre, si l'illustre {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} voulait bien m'accorder quelques minutes avant l'entrevue avec le gouverneur, {n}suggère Achilleas en inclinant la tête,{/n} je suis certain que mon rapport sur la situation du protectorat von Valancius lui serait utile. »

languages.text: "Cüretkârlığımı mazur görün ancak bir ricam olacaktı. Değerli Lord Kaptan, toplantı öncesinde birkaç dakikasını benimle görüşmeye ayırabilirler miydi acaba?" {n}Achilleas başını eğiyor.{/n} "Von Valancius protektorasındaki devlet meselelerine dair raporumu işe yarar bulacağınıza eminim."
languages.original_text: "I apologise for my bluntness, but I have a request to make. Perhaps, before the meeting takes place, the illustrious Lord Captain could spare a few minutes for a conversation with me?" {n}Achilleas bows his head.{/n} "I'm certain that you will find my report on the state of affairs in the von Valancius protectorate most useful."

traits.locale_text: "Cüretkârlığımı mazur görün ancak bir ricam olacaktı. Değerli Lord Kaptan toplantı gerçekleşmeden önce benimle sohbet etmeye birkaç dakika ayırabilirler miydi acaba?" {n}Achilleas başını eğiyor.{/n} "von Valancius protektorasındaki devlet meselelerine dair raporumu işe yarar bulacağınıza eminim."
